---
#title: "Blog"

    - posts/**/*.md
    - posts/**/*.qmd

    - "date desc"
    - "title desc"

  categories: numbered
  sort-ui: true

    #image, 
    date, 
    title, 
    categories, 
    reading-time, 
    description
    ]
  # image-placeholder: images/logo.png
  feed: true
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
